scripts.install:all: npm run install:agent-app && npm run install:demo-website && npm run install:cdk-stacks && npm run install:lambdas
scripts.echo:cdk-frontend-stack-physical-name: aws ssm get-parameter --query 'Parameter'.'Value' --name $(npm run --silent echo:cdk-frontend-stack-name-param) --output text
scripts.echo:web-app-bucket: aws cloudformation describe-stacks --stack-name $(npm run --silent echo:cdk-frontend-stack-physical-name) --query 'Stacks[0].Outputs[?OutputKey==`webAppBucket`].OutputValue' --output text
scripts.sync-config:agent-app: aws s3 cp s3://$(npm run --silent echo:web-app-bucket)/$(npm run --silent echo:web-app-root-prefix)frontend-config.js ../agent-app/
scripts.sync-config:demo-website: aws s3 cp s3://$(npm run --silent echo:web-app-bucket)/$(npm run --silent echo:web-app-root-prefix)frontend-config.js ../demo-website/
scripts.sync-config: npm run --silent sync-config:agent-app && npm run --silent sync-config:demo-website
scripts.build:frontend: npm run build:agent-app && npm run build:demo-website
scripts.build:frontend:cdk:deploy: npm run build:frontend && npm run cdk:deploy
